8.ara-name: كتاب الصوم عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Anas narrated:"The Messenger of Allah vowed to stay away from his wives for a month, so he stayed in a loft for twenty-nine days. They said: 'O Messenger of Allah, your vow was for a month,' so he said: 'The month is twenty-nine (days)

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ أَنَّ الشَّهْرَ يَكُونُ تِسْعًا وَعِشْرِينَ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About: The Month Is Twenty-Nine Days
